I have just installed Cantera 1.5.4 and Python 2.3.4.  I plan to use 
Cantera with Matlab, but haven't got that far because I can't get it 
to work with Python.

Python appears to be working correctly for non-Cantera commands, but 
when I enter 'from Cantera import *' I get

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in ?
  File "C:\PROGRA~1\Python23\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\__init__.py", 
line 9, in ?
    from exceptions import *
  File "C:\PROGRA~1\Python23\Lib\site-
packages\Cantera\exceptions.py", line 5, in ?
    import _cantera
ImportError: No module named _numpy

The Cantera files appear to be properly installed in Python23
\Lib\site-packages.

Any idea what my problem is?

Al Kornhauser
